title: Had an idea for Annie
body:
Didn't put too much thought into it so feel free to correct me, but what if the aoe damage on her ult was nerfed, but Tibbers autos and/or burn damage was buffed, so you know, people would actually fear her bear.

I just feel like tibbers doesnt really play too much of a role other than the aoe burst when he is summoned, and hes a giant fricken teddy bear. Id be  cool if more people were like ohno its tibbers ruuuuuuun

EDIT: Just to clarify, yeah he kind of does play a role in terms of blocking skill shots and tanking tower hits, but this change was kind of more aimed at changing Tibbers identity in the game, further explanation in a reply I made below.

replies.body: Or how about you just delete Annie

> [{quoted}](name=Olee,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=M0d2eFRP,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-10-08T19:46:35.987+0000)
>
> Or how about you just delete Annie

this seems like the obvious option

Or..
OORR
Make tibbers huge af with fire and lava drooling from his mouth whilst his auto is him flailing and biting at the enemy, who is running in fear of the large brown figure dismantling his limbs, bone, by bone...

"but I just wanted a hug!"
Maybe even allow tibbers to be targeted by champion-only targets(as if it's a 6th champ) for extra mechanical play(and lulu ult)

You underestimate Tibber's ability to tank anything from tower shots to skillshots. If you just send out tibbers and stay behind doing nothing (Annie *IS* a short ranged mage) rather than hug him like an actual teddy bear and use him to shield yourself + keep people from focusing you, you shouldn't find 450%~ AP AoE scaling weak at all.
its 980% scale for cast + 45 sec of burn (not including aa)
oh LOL this is what I get for not reading up in the wiki before hand. Multiply by 5 if the champions are bunched up :3

The main reason for this change was to kind of change Tibbers identity in the game, from basically being this protective wall who lives just to be summoned or try to protect Annie, to becoming a truly fearsome bear.

I guess I am wrong when I said he doesn't really provide much of a role other than the aoe burst, maybe because I never really get into a situation where I use tibbers to tank tower shots or skillshots, nevertheless what I was trying to say is wouldn't it be cool for Annie to be this intimidating little girl with a fearsome bear rather than an intimidating little girl with a bear that just takes all the hits for her and tries to get you to back off.

It was just a thought anyways, Tibbers how he is right now is still fine imo and is probably for the best.
You think you've seen true pain? Imagine warlock with aghanim's sceptre and refresher orb. Basically 4 Steroid tibbers, each as strong as a champion and always stun when summoned. Annie is fine.
you guys are also forgetting that Tibbers applies ryalais which is incredibly useful.
Tibbers actually has stupid damage late game. Just by standing in a fight he can deal 140 damage per second with 500 AP, or if Annie has around 1000 AP he can deal 240 per second.
True but we allready have a mordekaiser
na id rather tibbers be a tank, im sure i wouldnt even have 1 on my team in most games
I remember a annie with her passive and tibbers. He is just supp, he stns b4 annie kills
